mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BRANCH (THEME, BANK_NAME, DEPOSITOR, BRANCH_ACCOUNT, GENDER, BRANCH_COMMENT, ADDRESS, ADDRESS_DETAIL, BRANCH_TYPE, ISPARKING, ISELEVATOR, FACILITY, PET, MAXIMUM_RESIDENT, RULE, IMAGE_LIVING, IMAGE_KITCHIN, IMAGE_BATHROOM, IMAGE_ETC) VALUES (#{param1},#{param2},#{param3},#{param4},#{param5},#{param6},#{param7},#{param8},#{param9},#{param10},#{param11},#{param12},#{param13},#{param14},#{param15},#{param16},#{param17},#{param18},#{param19})
INSERT INTO ROOM(ROOM_NUMBER, BRANCH_NUMBER, GENDER, ALLOW_NUMBER, SPACE, DEPOSIT, MINTHLY_RENT, RENTABLE_DATE, FACILITY, IMAGE_ROOM) VALUES()
mapper.select: SELECT E.WRITING_NUMBER, E.MEMBER_NUMBER, E.TITLE, E.HIT, E.WRITE_TIME, E.CONTENT, E.ACCEPT_START_TIME, E.ACCEPT_END_TIME, E.CANCEL_REASON, E.RECRUIT_NUMBER, E.EVENT_START_TIME, E.EVENT_END_TIME, E.IMAGE, E.LIKE, M.NICKNAME FROM EVENT E, MEMBER M WHERE E.MEMBER_NUMBER = M.MEMBER_NUMBER
